main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 29 Sep 1960 involving an object approximately the size of a dime held at arm's length, with a large fire diminishing in size and dropping burning debris, followed by a loud explosion.
interesting points: The object was observed for 2-3 minutes,The sighting occurred in the evening hours between 2020-2030,The object's characteristics were described as a solid, well-defined silhouette,There is speculation that the sighting may be connected to fragments of a 1950 Spitfire,The report indicated that there is insufficient evidence for a valid conclusion.
sighted object: an object emitting fire and dropping burning debris
witness description: Pilot Hal Starr, who reported to the county sheriff.
